author: BitterSweet#1337
description: Use copy, listremotes, sync, delete, lsjson, and ls
install_msg:
**INSTALL RCLONE CLI TO YOUR SYSTEM (not venv), THIS IS JUST A WRAPPER**
You can use the universal install: `curl https://rclone.org/install.sh | sudo bash` to install onto your system.

Use [p]help rcl for commands
If you need help or anything join my server: https://discord.com/invite/ChS8MZDPRA
